t: Amazon.com : Chow Mein Noodles, Great for Lo-Mein, Went Indian Chow-mein | 12 oz by Finest Foods : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: COOKING INSTRUCTIONS • In a large pot, add 4 qts of water, 1 tsp of salt and 1 tbsp of cooking oil. Bring to a boil. Add 1 pack of Finest Brand ChowMein Noodles to boiling water and cook for 6-10 minutes or until desired tenderness is achieved. Drain and set aside.
